pr_title: Ports.parse in api should return Set, not ImmutableSet

timeline.message: Ports.parse in api should return Set, not ImmutableSet

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            - `Ports.parse(List<String> ports)` in api now returns `Set` instead of `ImmutableSet` ([#2513](https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/pull/2513))
          
          
            
            - `Ports.parse(List<String> ports)` now returns `Set` instead of `ImmutableSet` ([#2513](https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/pull/2513))
timeline.author: chanseokoh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,6 +9,7 @@ All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
 
 ### Changed
 
+- `Ports.parse(List<String> ports)` in api now returns `Set` instead of `ImmutableSet` ([#2513](https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/pull/2513))

timeline.bodyText: I think this should return a mutable set as an API.
timeline.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: Hrmm... I guess this isn't really a value class. Makes sense, I'll change the underlying implementation.
replies.author: loosebazooka
